product_name: Anon Majestic Premium Snow Goggles - Women's
long_description: When you're ready to hit the slopes, the women's Anon Majestic Premium snow goggles deliver clear optics and a comfortable fit at a great value for your days on the snow. Black Emblem frame has a Silver Amber lens with a versatile amber tint and 35% visible light transmission (VLT) for good depth perception in low, flat to partly cloudy light. Faultline frame has a Green Solex lens with a dark bronze tint, 18% VLT and a multilayer green mirror finish to cut glare and reduce eye fatigue in very sunny conditions. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging. Dual-layer foam with moisture-wicking fleece supplies a comfortable, snug seal around your face. Tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures for a comfortable, secure fit. Strap hinges ensure a flush fit that minimizes gaps and comfortably distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design of the snow goggles fits small-size faces; goggles come with a microfiber storage bag. As part of the Anon Premium series, the women's Anon Majestic Premium goggles feature the latest in high-resolution graphics and detailed frame and strap finishes.
short_description: When you're ready to hit the slopes, the women's Anon Majestic Premium snow goggles deliver clear optics and a comfortable fit at a great value for your days on the snow.
